text: Before 2010 - not sure the year as it's all a blur but between 2004 & 2008 somewhere I used to buy opiates from online pharmacies. Nothing too heavy, but darvecets and Vicodin (also Xanax and Klonopin). Sometimes they would come from Canada sometimes they would come in a peanut sac from Mexico or a burlap sac. Sometimes the pills were in pieces but they'd always be here for Xtra ones. Can't do that these days though. This wasn't on the dark web just the regular internet.

I think split dosing would help you. Say if you were at 30mgs take half in the morning and half a night. That is a very small dose so I don't really have too much experience with split dosing a dose that low but I have heard nothing but amazing things about people who started dosing twice a day.
